post_text:
Grade 7 – 12 Registration Update

In an effort to minimize gathering in groups, the upcoming registration process and dates have been changed. To streamline the process, all registration forms are available online and student schedules will be emailed by the day prior to the scheduled registration. Orientation videos will be posted prior to school for incoming freshmen and 7th grade students in lieu of an in-person orientation. Registration will be from 9:00 – 2:00 as follows:
Seniors – August 11
7th and 8th Grade – August 12
Juniors – August 13
Sophomores – August 14
Freshmen – August 17

Online Forms here: https://5il.co/j9mu

post_text:
UPDATED ACT INFORMATION

The safety of students and test center staff is ACT’s top priority. ACT has rescheduled its April 4 national test date to June 13 across the U.S. in response to concerns about the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19). All students registered for the April 4 test received an email from ACT informing them of the postponement and instructions for free rescheduling to June 13 or a future national test date. If you did not receive an email from ACT, you will need to contact them directly at 1-800-553-6244 ext. 1270.

post_text:
Pilot Grove Drama is proud to announce a virtual Talent Show!

Students, Staff and Members of the community are invited to submit school appropriate videos of their unique skills.

You can sing, tell jokes or stories, demonstrate a cool trick or something else. The possibilities are endless. Videos should be no more than 5 minutes and should be submitted to CTurner@PilotGrove.k12.mo.us by Wednesday, April 23.

We hope to post for video on Pilot Grove School's Facebook page by Saturday, April 25th.

post_text:
“Be the Light”
Parents, Community and Seniors of 2020

Tonight we will be joining the Nation in a movement for this years Seniors called “Be the Light”. At 8:20pm (20:20 Military) schools will light up their fields across the Nation for 20 mins. and 20 seconds. This is not a congregation at the fields but a moment to recognize our 2020 Seniors together and the experiences that they will be losing for the remainder of their school year. This will continue until Graduation every Friday Night. Thanks for your understanding and Pilot Grove wishes you all the best.
text:
“Be the Light”
Parents, Community and Seniors of 2020

Tonight we will be joining the Nation in a movement for this years Seniors called “Be the Light”. At 8:20pm (20:20 Military) schools will light up their fields across the Nation for 20 mins. and 20 seconds. This is not a congregation at the fields but a moment to recognize our 2020 Seniors together and the experiences that they will be losing for the remainder of their school year. This will continue until Graduation every Friday Night. Thanks for your understanding and Pilot Grove wishes you all the best.
